titleStmt.title: A Pindaric poem to the Reverend Doctor Burnet on the honour he did me of enquiring after me and my muse by Mrs. A. Behn.
titleStmt.author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.
Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
